about_the_game:
Golf Island is a casual arcade golf game where every round brings something new. Enjoy randomly generated levels that are created uniquely each time you play, ensuring no two courses are ever the same. You can also challenge yourself and friends on seed-based courses, where the same seed generates identical levels, perfect for comparing scores!

Key Features:

Randomly Generated & Seed-Based Levels:

Every course is dynamically created with endless variety. Play entirely random courses or share a seed-based course with friends to compete on the same layout.

Two Game Modes:

  • Classic Mode:

    Tee off on a classic golf course with increasing difficulty.

  • Endless Mode:

    Keep playing with dynamically generated courses that adapt to keep the challenge fresh.

Casual Arcade Fun:

Easy-to-learn controls make it the perfect game to pick up and play anytime.

Vibrant, Dynamic Courses:

Play in beautifully designed environments that keep the experience exciting.

Get ready to hit the links like never before in Golf Island—where the fun never stops, and the competition is just a round away!

Note: This game is in active development. All content shown is from a pre-release build and may change.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 @ 3.1GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460, Intel HD Graphics 630, or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 @ 3.3GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD R9 280, or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Golf Island is a casual arcade golf game with randomly generated levels. Tee off in vibrant, ever-changing courses for endless fun and fresh challenges. Perfect your swing and enjoy the ultimate pick-up-and-play golf experience!
